title: WvW API not showing new links

comments.author: darthmaim.6017
comments.body: The tile service will be updated once Lawton is back from his vacation.

comments.author: Reincarnated.1754
comments.body:
Tiersten.8502:

Looks like this was quietly fixed yesterday. The world IDs show the new links and you can query for all the server matches.

Yes, Working for me now.

Just need the Tile Service updating now

comments.author: Tiersten.8502
comments.body: Looks like this was quietly fixed yesterday. The world IDs show the new links and you can query for all the server matches.

comments.author: Reincarnated.1754
comments.body:
Totally messed up my app.
Ring of Fire = 2005, no where to be found in matches API.

comments.author: Tiersten.8502
comments.body:
The server links were changed on Friday but the WvW API still shows the old server links. e.g. Aurora Glade is world 2013 and the match data is https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/wvw/matches?world=2013

"all_worlds":{"red":[2205],"blue":[2004,2013],"green":[2006,2014]}

Red = 2205 (Drakkar Lake [DE])
Blue = 2004 (Blacktide) + 2013 (Aurora Glade)
Green = 2006 (Underworld) + 2014 (Gunnar’s Hold)

According to the forum post, the new links should be:

Drakkar Lake & Miller Sound [DE]
Aurora Glade & Ring of Fire
Gunnar’s Hold & Vabbi
